code: import{useState}from"react";const Validation=()=>{const[errors,setErrors]=useState({});const validate=values=>{let tempErrors={};if(!values.name){tempErrors.name="Name is required";}if(!values.email){tempErrors.email="Email is required";}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){tempErrors.email="Email is not valid";}if(!values.age){tempErrors.age="Age is required";}else if(isNaN(values.age)||values.age<=0){tempErrors.age="Age must be a number greater than 0";}if(!values.attendingWithGuest){tempErrors.attendingWithGuest="This field is required";}if(values.attendingWithGuest==="Yes"&&!values.guestName){tempErrors.guestName="Guest name is required";}setErrors(tempErrors);return Object.keys(tempErrors).length===0;};return{errors,validate};};export default Validation;
